mapper.select: SELECT myno, uid, eduop, eduno, score, edu_date FROM myeducation WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY edu_date
SELECT myno, uid, eduno, mycon, mydate, mystate, mycomple FROM myeducation ORDER BY mydate DESC
SELECT hp.textno, hp.texttitle, hp.uploaddate, hp.cnt, ar.arno, ar.artitle, ar.ardate, ar.cnt as cnt_ar, ar.uid, hp.cnt as cnt_hp FROM help hp JOIN adoprv ar ON hp.uid = ar.uid WHERE ar.uid = #{uid}
SELECT sa.sano, sa.sadate, sc.time, sa.astate , sc.stitle, sa.sno FROM servicea sa JOIN service sc ON sa.sno = sc.sno WHERE sa.uid = #{uid}
SELECT sa.sano, sc.time, sa.sadate, sa.astate, sa.uid, sc.stitle FROM servicea sa join service sc ON sa.sno = sc.sno ORDER BY sa.sano DESC
SELECT anino, aname, age, gender, weight, genop, intro, anipic, adopt, animal_date FROM animal WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY animal_date DESC
SELECT ani.anipic, ani.aname, ani.gender, ani.age, ani.weight, ani.genop, jj.anino, jj.jjimno FROM jjim jj join animal ani ON jj.anino = ani.anino WHERE jj.uid = #{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jjim WHERE uid = #{uid} AND anino = #{anino}
mapper.select: SELECT ac.comno, ac.adcm, ar.artitle, ac.acdate FROM adopcm ac join adoprv ar ON ac.arno = ar.arno WHERE ac.uid = #{uid}
SELECT ap.apno, an.anipic, ap.sub_cont, ap.sub_state, ap.subpic, ap.sub_date, ap.anino FROM adopt ap JOIN animal an ON ap.anino = an.anino WHERE ap.uid = #{uid}

SELECT AA.apno, AA.anipic, AA.sub_cont, AA.sub_state, AA.subpic, py.payno, py.payop, py.pdate, py.paymet, py.patamt, AA.sub_date, py.uid, py.imp_uid FROM payment py JOIN ( SELECT ap.apno, an.anipic, ap.sub_cont, ap.sub_state, ap.subpic, ap.sub_date FROM adopt ap JOIN animal an ON ap.anino = an.anino ) AA ON py.apno = AA.apno
SELECT uid, uname, email, passwd, tel, birth, mlevel, mdate, zipcode, addr1, addr2 FROM member ORDER BY mdate DESC
SELECT s_email, s_uname, s_mlevel, s_mdate FROM s_member ORDER BY s_mdate DESC

SELECT hp.textno, hp.texttitle, hp.uploaddate, ar.arno, ar.artitle, ar.ardate, ar.uid FROM help hp JOIN adoprv ar ON hp.uid = ar.uid WHERE ar.uid = #{uid}
AND hp.texttitle like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
